hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: Please don't abandon this seed. Our world deserves saving!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Never give up. Trust your instincts!

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #6# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Carpenters' Boss House#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to the #Light Medallion#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.
